pr_title: [#3645] Create new endpoints for the app to retrieve datapoints in smaller chunks

timeline.message:
[#3645] WIP new simple datapoint endpoint

Co-authored-by: Juan A. Ruz <juanantonioruz@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Emmanuel Mulo <emmanuel@akvo.org>

[#3645] Increase the query limit for datapoints

* The new servlet only returns datapoints without subentities like form instances or responses included.  We are thus able to return more entities in a single request

[#3645] Refactor code - Extract common method to DataPointUtil

Co-Authored-By: Juan A. Ruz <juanantonioruz@gmail.com>
Co-Authored-By: Emmanuel Mulo <emmanuel@akvo.org>

[#3645] Add FormInstanceUtil and DataUtil test support

Co-Authored-By: Ivan Perdomo <ivan@akvo.org>
Co-Authored-By: Emmanuel Mulo <emmanuel@akvo.org>

[#3645] Fix test and implementation of FormInstanceUtil

Co-Authored-By: Emmanuel Mulo <emmanuel@akvo.org>
[#3645] Optimize imports
[#3645] Update copyright headers

[#3645] Rename test methods, adds a new test

* Test that we're filtering data by "Assignment"
[#3645] Use more direct assertion and rename variable to clarify

[#3645]Refactor and rename DataPointServlet2 to DataPointOnlyServlet

Removing redundant check for SurveyAssignments without
DataPointAssignment #3511 ensures that all SurveyAssignments have the
correspondent datapoint assignment

Co-Authored-By: Emmanuel Mulo <emmanuel@akvo.org>

[#3645] Renaming DataPointServletTest > DataPointUtilTest and

DataUtil > DataStoreTestUtil

Co-Authored-By: Emmanuel Mulo <emmanuel@akvo.org>

[#3645] Add explicit limit in DataPointUtil.getAssignedDataPoints

Co-Authored-By: Emmanuel Mulo <emmanuel@akvo.org>

[#3645] Add explicit pageSize to FormInstanceUtil/getFormInstances

Co-Authored-By: Emmanuel Mulo <emmanuel@akvo.org>

[#3645] Remove o.w.m.a.w.dto.QasDto o.w.m.a.w.dto.SurveyInstanceDto

And use o.w.m.a.g.c.surveyinstance.SurveyInstanceDto instead

Co-Authored-By: Emmanuel Mulo <emmanuel@akvo.org>

[#3645] Add test for date serialization format

Co-Authored-By: Juan A. Ruz <juanantonioruz@gmail.com>

[#3654] Add new servlet action to retrieve the list of form instances

* The form instances are not yet fully populated with the responses
[#3654] Implement formInstanceUtil.getFormInstancesDtoList
[#3645] Test formInstanceUtil.getFormInstancesDtoList

[#3645] Modify FormInstanceUtilTest

* Compare the input form instances with the out put DTO list
* Use a more realistic question
[#3654] Update copyright notice

[#3654] Use datapoint identifier parameter for retrieving form instance

Co-Authored-By: Juan A. Ruz <juanantonioruz@gmail.com>
[#3645] Include exception logging and response for error conditions

timeline.bodyText: not sure if every exception is a not found exception 🤔 ... maybe we need a couple of specific exceptions to know which kind was thrown (eg: DeviceNotFoundException) from the formInstanceUtil
timeline.author: tangrammer

replies.bodyText: then you enter in the longish conversation of checked vs unchecked exceptions. https://www.baeldung.com/java-checked-unchecked-exceptions
replies.author: iperdomo

timeline.bodyText: We're not using this class. Let's remove the import.
timeline.author: iperdomo

timeline.message: [#3645] Remove unused import
